ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // [Save Point]
Access the menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

dialogStrings:
Oh, oh oh oh oh!!
Push the {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} button to jump!

Get the treasure by holding
the Left or Right Directional buttons down
while repeatedly pressing {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}!

Hold down the Left Direction button
while repeatedly pressing {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
to get the treasure!

Hold down the Right Direction button
while repeatedly pressing {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE}
to get the treasure!

You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

[Save Point]
Access the menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.
